content: love marly bird patterns become a marly bird insider for sneak peeks exclusive discounts and behind-the-scenes yarny fun https //marlybird kit com/insider ----- **stockbridge crochet cabled stocking** a richly textured crochet christmas stocking pattern featuring bold diamond cables bobbles and a classic fold-over cuff worked from cuff to toe with an afterthought heel this stocking creates an heirloom-quality piece perfect for holiday decorating or gifting pattern features fully written instructions cable panel diagram only in ad-free pdf special stitch glossary clear construction notes printer-friendly ad-free pdf available for purchase details skill level intermediate finished size 21 long 15 circumference yarn worsted weight sample herrschners worsted 8 heathers hook i/9 5 5 mm a beautiful choice for classic modern masculine or colorful holiday themes make one or a matching family set
